paragraph-1: The "Campeonato Brasileiro Série A", commonly referred to as Brasileirão, is the Brazilian professional league for men's football clubs.
paragraph-2: At the top of the Brazilian football league system, it is the country's primary football competition.
paragraph-3: The Campeonato Brasileiro is one of the strongest leagues in the world. It contains the most club world champion titles, and the second-most "Copa Libertadores" titles.
paragraph-4: Brasileirão is the most-watched football league in the Americas and one of the world's most exposed broadcast in 155 nations.
